    • Field Detail

      • LMTasks

        protected LMAIBase[] LMTasks
        Array of tasks a LMob is able to use. Mob class that extends from this will need to fill this array upon contruction.

      • currentTask

        private int currentTask
        Pointers to the positions in LMTasks array of the currently executing task, and the next task that should execute, respectively.

      • nextTask

        private int nextTask
        Pointers to the positions in LMTasks array of the currently executing task, and the next task that should execute, respectively.

      • prevState

        private EntityLearningMob.State prevState
        Battle states saved before and after the current task's execution, respectively.

      • curState

        private EntityLearningMob.State curState
        Battle states saved before and after the current task's execution, respectively.

      • QLearningRate

        private static final double QLearningRate
        Value used in the Q-learning algorithm. The higher this value, the higher the impact of instant rewards is.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • QDiscountFactor

        private static final double QDiscountFactor
        Value used in the Q-learning algorithm. The higher this value, the higher the impact of long term rewards is.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • QRandomDiscountFactor

        private static final double QRandomDiscountFactor
        Value used in the Q-learning algorithm. It determines the variation on the QRandomSelectionRate factor for every iteration, which will be defined in the mob class
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • isEntityInvulnerable

        public boolean isEntityInvulnerable()
        Makes the entity invulnerable while its autoRespawning is being handled. Needed to avoid issues with entity not completely respawning if hit in the autorespawn process.
        Overrides:

      • onUpdate

        public void onUpdate()
        Overrides:
        onUpdate in class net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving

      • isAIEnabled

        protected boolean isAIEnabled()
        Overrides:
        isAIEnabled in class net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving

      • updateAITick

        protected void updateAITick()
        This is where the q-learning algorithm iterates. Every iteration, and only once the current executing task has finished, compares the states before and after executing the task, and obtains a reward based on this, in order to update the QValues map accordingly. Then it chooses a new task, either randomly or checking in the qvalues map again for the best possible task from current state. Special cases: -First iteration: if no task was performed before, and thus no state was saved, just chooses a task to execute. -Autorespawning handling -Fight won: if the target was killed, there's no need to choose a new task.
        Overrides:
        updateAITick in class net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase

      • obtainReward

        private double obtainReward()
        Obtains a reward based on the states before and after executing a task. Takes into account the variation in this entity's life and the enemy's life.

      • updateQ_Values

        private void updateQ_Values(double reward)
        Updates the value for the current state and the just finished task in the Q_values table, based on the obtained reward.

      • obtainNextTask

        private void obtainNextTask()
        Selects a new task for the next iteration. It can return a random task or the task with the highest expected reward for the current state, based on the QRandomSelectionRate factor's value (the higher this value, the higher the possibility of using this task.

      • getQState

        private int getQState(EntityLearningMob.State state)
        Designates the state passed as parameter a unique id value, different from every state. Takes into account the distance to target, the life of this entity and the life of the enemy.

      • getQKey

        private int getQKey(int state,
          int task)
        Designates a unique id value to the combination of a state and a task. This will be the key in the Q_values table.

      • getTaskWithMaxQValue

        private int getTaskWithMaxQValue(EntityLearningMob.State state)
        Returns the task with the highest expected reward (in the Q_values table) for passed state.

      • getDistanceState

        private int getDistanceState(float distance)
        Designates a unique id value to the distance passed. At a higher level, it divides the possibilities of distance between entity and enemy in three levels: out of range, ranged range or melee range.

      • getHPState

        private int getHPState(float health,
             float maxHealth)
        Designates a unique id value to a certain HP value, based on the max HP value possible. At a higher level, it divides the HP bar of an entity in three levels: high, medium or low health.

      • onKillEntity

        public void onKillEntity(net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase p_70074_1_)
        Called when this entity kills its target. Enables max reward for next q-learning algorithm iteration
        Overrides:
        onKillEntity in class net.minecraft.entity.Entity

      • onDeathUpdate

        protected void onDeathUpdate()
        AutoRespawning handling. Also, sets the mob to a random position before resurrecting.
        Overrides:
        onDeathUpdate in class net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase

      • canRespawnHere

        private boolean canRespawnHere()
        Checks if mob is not standing over a prohibited block when respawning. False for StaticLiquids and Fences.

      • onDeath

        public void onDeath(net.minecraft.util.DamageSource p_70645_1_)
        Autorespawning handling. Final iteration in the q-learning algorithm for negative max reward.
        Overrides:
        onDeath in class net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase

      • handleAutoRespawn

        private void handleAutoRespawn()
        Autorespawning handling.

      • interact

        protected boolean interact(net.minecraft.entity.player.EntityPlayer p_70085_1_)
        Called when player interacts with a mob. Currently for debugging purposes only. In the future, will probably open GUI for visualizing q-learning algorithm data.
        Overrides:
        interact in class net.minecraft.entity.EntityLiving

      • getQ_Values

        protected abstract java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> getQ_Values()
        Getter of the QValues map.

      • getTotalLMTasks

        protected abstract int getTotalLMTasks()
        Getter of the total number of tasks the mob is able to perform.

      • Q_values_init

        protected abstract void Q_values_init()
        This method is in charge of setting the QValues map upon construction of the mob. Will load the map from the correct file in the saves folder, or if inexistent, will create an empty map.

      • getQRandomSelectionRate

        protected abstract double getQRandomSelectionRate()
        Getter of the QRandomSelectionRate factor. This determines how probably will a random task be chosen, instead of the best task.

      • setQRandomSelectionRate

        protected abstract void setQRandomSelectionRate(double value)
        Setter of the QRandomSelectionRate factor.

      • getQIterations

        protected abstract int getQIterations()
        Getter of the number of qiterations that have been executed since the beginning of executions. Currently without proper use.

      • setQIterations

        protected abstract void setQIterations(int value)
        Setter of the number of qiterations that have been executed since the beginning of executions. Currently without proper use.
